last_episode_to_air.name: The Aceman Cometh
last_episode_to_air.overview: In a special cartoon crossover, Stanley gets some help from Ace Ventura, Pet Detective to recover his kidnapped dog.

name: The Mask: Animated Series
overview: Insecure bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss uses an ancient mask to gain superpowers while taking on the mischievous and cartoonish, but heroic and good-hearted personality of The Mask

episodes.name: The Mask is Always Greener on the Other Side (1)
episodes.overview: After causing him nothing but trouble, Stanley Ipkiss gets rid of his mask by burying it in quick-drying cement, but must retrieve it to save Peggy and Milo from Pretorius.

episodes.name: The Mask is Always Greener on the Other Side (2)
episodes.overview: Pretorius tricks Stanley's friend and co-worker, Charlie, into building a "house of tomorrow". The Mask must stop him and save Peggy, Charlie and Milo.

episodes.name: Baby's Wild Ride
episodes.overview: When Stanley reluctantly agrees to baby-sit for his neighbors, the mask somehow gets on Baby's face...producing Baby Mask!

episodes.name: The Terrible Twos
episodes.overview: When Lt. Kellaway suspects that Stanley and The Mask are one and the same, he handcuffs himself to Stanley in order to keep an eye on his every move.

episodes.name: Sister Mask
episodes.overview: Stanley discovers a fabled "sister" mask that, when joined with his mask, allows him to control his wild alter-ego.

episodes.name: Shadow of a Skillit
episodes.overview: Shadows are being stolen from all over Edge City! And everyone whose shadow is stolen loses his or her youth and starts to age rapidly.

episodes.name: Bride of Pretorius
episodes.overview: Stanley falls in love with a very shy woman...but her shyness evaporates when she accidentally dons the mask.

episodes.name: Double Reverse
episodes.overview: Stanley tries to add some excitement to his life by using "reverse psychology" to let the Mask's personality come out of himself.

episodes.name: Shrink Rap
episodes.overview: Stanley's psychologist, Dr. Neumann, won't believe that Stanley is The Mask. Out of frustration, Stanley shows his therapist the mask, not expecting the doctor to put it on.

episodes.name: Mayor Mask
episodes.overview: Stanley is so upset with Edge City's government that his alter ego, The Mask, campaigns for mayor!

episodes.name: Martian Mask
episodes.overview: When a top-secret government agency believes The Mask to be an alien, Stanley must not only contend with his nemesis, Lt. Kellaway, who believes The Mask is a criminal, but also Agent X.

episodes.name: How Much Is That Dog in the Tin Can?
episodes.overview: Milo dons the mask to go after an evil dogcatcher who turns out to be a wanted felon.

episodes.name: All Hallow's Eve
episodes.overview: Skillit returns on Halloween! He's back to claim the mask and pay Stanley back for being put in a school for delinquents.

episodes.name: Santa Mask
episodes.overview: When Edge City suffers a rash of bank robberies committed by men in Santa Claus costumes, Mayor Tilton orders a city-wide dragnet and rounds up everyone dressed as Santa Claus.

episodes.name: Split Personality
episodes.overview: The mask breaks in two when Walter punches it.

episodes.name: A Comedy of Eras
episodes.overview: A mad scientist sends the Mask on a journey through time. He visits the future and goes back to the Salem Witch Trials.

episodes.name: Goin' for the Green
episodes.overview: The mayor of Edge City recruits a businessman to help distract attention from the Mask. However, the businessman uses the opportunity to store nuclear waste in the city.

episodes.name: Flight as a Feather
episodes.overview: The Mask loses his lucky fedora feather before a karaoke contest, sending him on a wild hunt through the city.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad and the Fish Guy
episodes.overview: When the villainous Fish Guy returns and steals the mask, Stanley has to team up with another villain.

episodes.name: Malled
episodes.overview: Robbers trap Stanley at the mega-mall. His dog Milo must bring him the mask to save the day.

episodes.name: Channel Surfin'
episodes.overview: A villain traps the Mask inside a television, sending him on an adventure across the channels.

episodes.name: Mask au Gratin
episodes.overview: While giving a girl a tour of the city, she transforms into a monster that turns everything into cheese.

episodes.name: Jurassic Mask
episodes.overview: A machine at the museum brings dinosaurs to life. They escape and wreak havoc on the city.

episodes.name: You Oughta Be in Pictures
episodes.overview: An action star comes to town to shoot a movie, challenging the Mask and threatening the city with a nuclear bomb.

episodes.name: For All Mask-Kind
episodes.overview: Stanley is sent into space but the Mask also comes along for the ride.

episodes.name: Up the Creek
episodes.overview: Stanley and a friend go on a river-rafting trip and wind up almost marrying two hillbilly girls.

episodes.name: Boogie with the Man
episodes.overview: Envious of the mask's luck, Stanley makes a deal with the devil.

episodes.name: What Goes Around Comes Around
episodes.overview: A villain traps Stanley in a time loop and he is doomed to relive the same half hour over and over again.

episodes.name: All Hail the Mask
episodes.overview: When the Mask takes a trip to a Pacific island, the natives worship him as a god. They then decide to sacrifice him.

episodes.name: Power of Suggestion
episodes.overview: A magician hypnotizes Stanley for entertainment. When a villain interrupts the show, he takes advantage and uses Stanley as his personal slave.

episodes.name: Mr. Mask Goes to Washington
episodes.overview: The Mask saves the President of the United States from getting crushed, landing him a job as presidential bodyguard.

episodes.name: Rain of Terror
episodes.overview: A disgraced weatherman turns into a supervillain known as the Tempest.

episodes.name: The Mother of All Hoods
episodes.overview: After the Mask humiliates Lt. Kellaway, he tries to prove his worth as a policeman by saving the mayor from an evil plot.

episodes.name: To Bee or Not to Bee
episodes.overview: When a beekeeper is transformed into a bee-human hybrid, he uses powers of hypnosis to make the town work in his beehive.

episodes.name: Love Potion Number 8 1/2
episodes.overview: A spilled love potion causes Stanley to fall in love with his grumpy landlady.

episodes.name: Cool Hand Mask
episodes.overview: The Mask is framed for stealing from a children's baseball team. With the Mask in prison, his nemesis Pretorius can finally take over the city.

episodes.name: Broadway Malady
episodes.overview: A Broadway musical director turns Stanley's favorite action series into a musical. The Mask attempts to ruin the production, sending the director on a mad rampage.

episodes.name: Enquiring Masks Want to Know
episodes.overview: A villain unleashes a swarm of mythical creatures. Peggy uses the chaos as an opportunity to further her writing career.

episodes.name: Future Mask
episodes.overview: The Mask travels to the future and is caught in a war between an evil mayor and a rebel army.

episodes.name: Sealed Fate
episodes.overview: When the Mask racks up a massive credit card bill, Stanley is forced to work as a salesman for the company. However, the company has evil plans.

episodes.name: (The Angels Wanna Wear My) Green Mask
episodes.overview: The Mask and Lieutenant Kellaway are killed in an explosion and sent to a council of angels.

episodes.name: Mutiny of the Bounty Hunters
episodes.overview: Dr. Pretorius hires two bounty hunters to capture the Mask, but Stanley is busy babysitting for his neighbor.

episodes.name: Convention of Evil
episodes.overview: Villains from previous episodes participate in a group therapy session, voicing their troubles with the Mask in this clip show.

episodes.name: The Green Marine
episodes.overview: When the Mask engages in his usual antics while enlisted in the marines, he is put on trial in a military court.

episodes.name: Counterfeit Mask
episodes.overview: When Stanley accidentally switches suitcases with another traveler at the airport, Peggy is forced to don the mask.

episodes.name: Magic
episodes.overview: Stanley reunites with his high school dream girl. She turns out to be a magician and a criminal.

episodes.name: Little Big Mask
episodes.overview: The Mask creates an anti-aging cream that works a little too well.

episodes.name: Fantashtick Voyage
episodes.overview: Stanley blames the Mask when his dog Milo is infected with a computer virus.

episodes.name: They Came from Within
episodes.overview: The Mask and Lieutenant Kellaway get trapped inside a comic book world where characters think the officer is their arch-enemy.

episodes.name: To Have and Have Snot
episodes.overview: When Dr. Pretorius creates a giant monster out of mucus, Stanley discovers the deadly consequences of having a cold while wearing the mask.

episodes.name: Mystery Cruise
episodes.overview: Stanley celebrates his birthday by bringing his friends on a cruise, but Dr. Pretorius threatens them with a tidal wave machine.

episodes.name: The Goofalotatots
episodes.overview: Stanley's favorite cartoon characters come to visit him in real life, stirring up trouble.

episodes.name: When Pigs Ruled the Earth
episodes.overview: The Mask and Peggy travel through time and visit a futuristic society where pigs keep humans as slaves.

episodes.name: The Aceman Cometh
episodes.overview: In a special cartoon crossover, Stanley gets some help from Ace Ventura, Pet Detective to recover his kidnapped dog.
